name: src/actions.js
createBoard
description:
Dispatches a createBoard action to the state via boardReducer
No params necessary.
Invoke to create a new board state from scratch.

name: setPiece
description: Sets a single piece, which is represented by an array of its coordinates

params.name: piece
params.description: an array of tile ID strings, ex: ['1,1','4,3']

name: setRandomPieces
description: Sets a 2x1, 3x1, 4x1, and 5x1 piece on one player's board. TODO - prevent overlaps.

name: randomPieces
description: OLD/FOR TESTING ONLY: randomly selects 14 tiles to have bread

name: setChat
description: Adds a chat to the chat store

name: updatePieces
description: Updates a player's piece count in the state

name: setUser
description: Takes in the player's username, level, and chats, and modifies state to reflect

name: guess
description:
Performs a 'guess' action on a single tile. Depending on whether or not there is
bread on that tile, different actions will occur.

params.name: player
params.description: either 'p1' or 'p2'. Represents TARGET player's board.

params.name: id
params.description: the ID of the guessed tile, ex: '1,1' or '4,3'

name: src/reducers/boardReducer.js
boardReducer
description: This function handles changes to the board state resulting from a state.dispatch(action)

unknown.tagValue: a new state, based on the type of action it receives

params.name: state
params.description: state is an object representing each players' board. Example:

params.name: action
params.description: an action dispatched via an action creator from ../actions.js

properties.name: state.p1Pieces
properties.description: Number of remaining pieces for player 1

properties.name: state.p2Pieces
properties.description: Number of remaining pieces for player 2

properties.name: state.p1[tileId]
properties.description: Tile object, indexed by id string

properties.name: state.p2[tileId]
properties.description: Tile object, indexed by id string

properties.name: payload
properties.description: varies in shape for each action

return.description: a new state, based on the type of action it receives

name: src/reducers/chatReducer.js
chatReducer
description: This function handles changes to the chats state resulting from a state.dispatch(action)

unknown.tagValue: a new state, based on the type of action it receives

params.name: state
params.description: chat state is an array of chat objects. Default: []

params.name: action
params.description: an action obj with shape { type: { string }, payload: { obj }}

return.description: a new state, based on the type of action it receives

name: src/reducers/gameInfoReducer.js
gameInfoReducer
description: Reducer function for the gameInfo portion of the redux state

unknown.tagValue: a new state, based on the type of action it receives

properties.name: state.p1Pieces
properties.description: number of pieces remaining for p1

properties.name: state.p2Pieces
properties.description: number of pieces remaining for p2

return.description: a new state, based on the type of action it receives

name: src/reducers/index.js
reducers
description: Combines boardReducer, chatReducer, and gameInfoReducer into reducers for exporting

name: src/reducers/userReducer.js
src/server-helpers.js
src/store.js

content:
# Battle Bread!

> A bread-themed Battleship clone

## Team

  - Devon Yu
  - Stephanie Wong
  - Ephraim Glick
  - Ben Stephens

## Table of Contents

1. [Usage](#Usage)
1. [Requirements](#requirements)
1. [Development](#development)
    1. [Installing Dependencies](#installing-dependencies)
    1. [Tasks](#tasks)
1. [Roadmap](#roadmap)
1. [Contributing](#contributing)

## Usage

> Use it! Woot

## Requirements

- Node ^6.4.0
- Express ^4.16.1
- Lodash ^4.17.4
- Prop-types ^15.6.0
- Random-int ^1.0.0
- React ^16.0.0
- React-dom ^16.0.0
- React-redux ^5.0.6
- Redux ^3.7.2
- Redux-logger ^3.0.6
- Sequelize ^4.13.2"

## Development

### Resuming Your Work

From within the root directory:

```sh
npm run update
```

If working with React:

```sh
npm run react-dev
```

### Installing Dependencies

From within the root directory:

```sh
npm install
```

### Roadmap

View the project roadmap [here](LINK_TO_DOC)


## Contributing

See [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) for contribution guidelines.
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "battlebread",
  "version": "0.0.2",
  "description": "",
  "main": "server/index.js",
  "author": "Battle Bread Team",
  "license": "",
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=6.4.0"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "react-dev": "open ./client/index.html && webpack -d --watch",
    "react-doc": "./node_modules/.bin/esdoc && open docs/index.html",
    "update": "git pull upstream master && npm install"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "axios": "^0.16.2",
    "cors": "^2.8.4",
    "express": "^4.16.1",
    "immutability-helper": "^2.4.0",
    "lodash": "^4.17.4",
    "mysql": "^2.15.0",
    "prop-types": "^15.6.0",
    "random-int": "^1.0.0",
    "react": "^16.0.0",
    "react-dom": "^16.0.0",
    "react-redux": "^5.0.6",
    "react-router": "^4.2.0",
    "redux": "^3.7.2",
    "redux-logger": "^3.0.6",
    "sequelize": "^4.13.8"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-cli": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-loader": "^7.1.2",
    "babel-plugin-transform-decorators": "^6.24.1",
    "babel-plugin-transform-object-rest-spread": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.6.0",
    "babel-preset-es2015": "^6.6.0",
    "babel-preset-react": "^6.24.1",
    "babel-register": "^6.7.2",
    "esdoc": "^1.0.3",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^4.8.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb": "^15.1.0",
    "eslint-config-hackreactor": "git://github.com/reactorcore/eslint-config-hackreactor.git",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.7.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.4.0",
    "webpack": "^3.6.0",
    "webpack-dev-server": "^2.9.1"
  },
  "babel": {
    "presets": [
      "es2015"
    ]
  }
}
